backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with all core domain types for routines, scoring, profiles, body composition, utilities, and tokens.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature-evidence mappings detailing which frontend files implement specific UI redesign and interaction features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of numerous frontend files for documentation and build planning.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app handling auth, profile setup, routing, theme, and legal disclaimer flow.
frontend/src/components/AutophagyScoreIn: Dialog component explaining Autophagy Score breakdown with icons, progress indicators, and multilingual ranges.
frontend/src/components/BodyCompositionC: Displays weight, body fat, muscle mass, and BMI with color-coded indicators and preset adjustment chips.
frontend/src/components/ChecklistCard.ts: Renders a checklist card with toggleable items, optional descriptions, and an icon header.
frontend/src/components/ChipsInput.tsx: Provides clickable preset buttons for adjusting numeric values.
Canvas-based circular dial that visualizes and adjusts a numeric value using gradient coloring and drag interaction.
frontend/src/components/DailyCoachingCar: Shows daily coaching steps and insights with category styling and icons.
frontend/src/components/EnergyCapsule.ts: Visual capsule that fills based on completion percentage and optionally adds a glow effect.
frontend/src/components/FastingTimer.tsx: Fasting duration selector using a chronograph dial with color gradients and feedback text.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer with branding, year, and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/FutureProjection: Presents biological age, body form, and energy projections with trend icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/GradientSlider.t: A customizable slider with a dynamic gradient track, optional scale labels, and value change handling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: The app header providing navigation, token balance display, settings access, and logout handling with a mobile sidebar menu.
frontend/src/components/JournalCard.tsx: Displays and manages journal entries with create, edit, delete, and sorting functionality, supporting German and English labels.
frontend/src/components/LegalDisclaimerM: A modal showing a bilingual legal disclaimer with acknowledgment logic, especially on first launch.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Login screen using Internet Identity with branding, loading state, and feature icons.
frontend/src/components/NutritionCard.ts: Tracks protein, vegetable, and water intake with stepper inputs and preset chips, supporting German/English labels.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Renders a profile setup form that collects user info, validates inputs, and saves the profile via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/ScoreRing.tsx: Displays an animated score ring with dynamic colors, gradients, and optional trend sparkline visualization.
frontend/src/components/SettingsDialog.t: Provides a dialog for editing and saving user profile settings, prefilled from the stored profile.
frontend/src/components/SleepCard.tsx: Shows sleep duration and quality controls using a stepper and dial with labels and color gradients.
frontend/src/components/SmartInsight.tsx: Displays a small insight card with an icon and message based on the insight type.
frontend/src/components/SmartInsightsOve: Shows temporary motivational or warning messages based on score thresholds with animated overlay styling.
frontend/src/components/StepperInput.tsx: Implements a numeric stepper with click-and-hold acceleration for incrementing and decrementing values.
frontend/src/components/StressCard.tsx: Renders a stress‑tracking card with inputs for systolic, diastolic, and pulse, computing a color‑coded status indicator. Supports German/English labels and displays status severity based on vital ranges.
frontend/src/components/SupplementCard.t: Manages supplement entries with add, edit, delete, sort, and completion‑tracking features. Uses local form state and backend callbacks to persist and update supplement data.
frontend/src/components/TokenWallet.tsx: Displays token balance, transactions, rewards, and admin tools, with transfer and address‑copy functionality. Integrates multiple queries, identity handling, and UI tabs for wallet operations.
frontend/src/components/TrainingCard.tsx: Allows adding, listing, removing, and saving training sessions with type, duration, and intensity fields. Supports German/English labels and triggers optional load/save/clear actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, reinitializing on identity changes. Invalidates and refetches dependent queries when the actor updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity context with login, logout, identity persistence, and status tracking. Wraps AuthClient setup and exposes identity to consuming components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping actor calls for user profiles, routines, tokens, supplements, trainings, and analytics.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, theme variables, and custom luxury-style utility classes for UI effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AnalysisPage.tsx: Displays charts and aggregated statistics from daily routines and body composition, with an option to reset analysis data.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard showing fasting, sleep, stress, training, nutrition, supplements, and scoring with extensive state and mutation handling.
frontend/src/pages/JournalPage.tsx: Provides CRUD functionality for personal journal entries with language-aware UI and timestamp formatting.
frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx: Shows the LIV token wallet UI with blockchain-related info and localized descriptions.
frontend/src/utils/dailyCoaching.ts: Generates prioritized daily coaching steps based on routine metrics and health scores. Adds actionable recommendations for sleep, hydration, fasting, training, nutrition, and stress.
frontend/src/utils/dailyCoachingInsights: Produces up to three coaching insights using current metrics and trends. Includes warnings, tips, praise, and trend-based feedback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the hash. Supports both query-string and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, shadows, and layout settings. Adds custom themes, plugins, and UI tokens for the app's design system.
project_state.json: Describes the project state and requirements for replacing slider-based routine inputs with modern dashboard-aligned UI controls. Lists existing features, new requests, and architectural notes.
